column5: Spacious room with a private entrance and private bathroom. House is minutes away from the train station that takes you directly downtown and a 20 min drive to downtown! And only 15min from the Domain!  Room comes with a mini fridge, stocked with water, and TV connected to Hulu, Netflix and Sling TV. Other bedroom acts as a gym that you are welcome to use or has the option of adding an air mattress to accommodate larger parties. Use the room like a hotel or come join us in the living areas!
column8: Spacious Bedroom w/ Private Entrance and Bathroom
